abstract: NHL Roundup; Carolina Hurricanes defeat New Jersey Devils, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.

headline.print_headline: Devils’ Playoff Hopes Fade; Blackhawks Clinch a Berth
headline.main: Devils’ Playoff Hopes Fade With a Defeat at Carolina

snippet: With six games left in the regular season, the Devils face a difficult climb to reach the last wild card spot in the Eastern Conference.
lead_paragraph: With six games left in the regular season, the Devils face a difficult climb to reach the last wild card spot in the Eastern Conference.
